listings.subtitle: Manage items you have listed for auction

empty.title: No listings yet
empty.description: You haven't listed any items for auction yet. Go to an auction and add your first item!

drafts.title: Drafts
drafts.description: These items are not yet visible to other auction members. Click to edit and publish them.

justEnded.title: Just Ended
justEnded.description: These items ended in the last 3 days and need your attention. Contact the winners to arrange delivery.
